BiggerDesc: Should I trust my instincts? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Hope I can bring you victory like always.
SmallerDesc: Should I trust my instincts? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Hope I can bring you victory like always.

BiggerDesc: The calculation result is <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Trust me. The result is absolutely accurate.
SmallerDesc: The calculation result is <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Trust me. The result is absolutely accurate.

BiggerDesc: Hmm... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> if you ask me. How is it? Did I get it right?
SmallerDesc: Hmm... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> if you ask me. How is it? Did I get it right?

BiggerDesc: Need my help, Commandant? I think this time the result should be... <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>.
SmallerDesc: Need my help, Commandant? I think this time the result should be... <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>.

BiggerDesc: Since you asked me sincerely, I'll let you have the answer! It's <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>!
SmallerDesc: Since you asked me sincerely, I'll let you have the answer! It's <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>!

BiggerDesc: I think it has to be <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> this time! Believe me, Commandant! I'm good at these games!
SmallerDesc: I think it has to be <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> this time! Believe me, Commandant! I'm good at these games!

BiggerDesc: The same question again! Go... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>! Hey! Don't get such a simple question wrong!
SmallerDesc: The same question again! Go... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>! Hey! Don't get such a simple question wrong!

BiggerDesc: I haven't play this game for a long time... Although I'm not good at it, I think you should choose <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> this time.
SmallerDesc: I haven't play this game for a long time... Although I'm not good at it, I think you should choose <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> this time.

BiggerDesc: ...Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. This is the last time I help you.
SmallerDesc: ...Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. This is the last time I help you.

BiggerDesc: Based on the result of this random color divination... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>, Commandant! You have to believe this time!
SmallerDesc: Based on the result of this random color divination... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>, Commandant! You have to believe this time!

BiggerDesc: Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Split the prize with me if you win, Commandant.
SmallerDesc: Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Split the prize with me if you win, Commandant.

BiggerDesc: Based on the cards we have, I tend to go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>, Commandant.
SmallerDesc: Based on the cards we have, I tend to go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>, Commandant.

BiggerDesc: <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. I gave you the answer. What will you give me in return?
SmallerDesc: <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. I gave you the answer. What will you give me in return?

BiggerDesc: My answer comes with a price... <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Now you have the answer. It's time to pay the price.
SmallerDesc: My answer comes with a price... <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Now you have the answer. It's time to pay the price.

BiggerDesc: You just can't get tired of this game, can you...? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Why? Just a random choice.
SmallerDesc: You just can't get tired of this game, can you...? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Why? Just a random choice.

BiggerDesc: You want me to play this game of luck? Well then... go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. Hopefully a miracle will happen.
SmallerDesc: You want me to play this game of luck? Well then... go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. Hopefully a miracle will happen.

BiggerDesc: My opinion? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. I'll take you to the victory you want.
SmallerDesc: My opinion? Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. I'll take you to the victory you want.

BiggerDesc: You should go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>! Wanna know the tricks? Pay me and I'll teach you when you're free.
SmallerDesc: You should go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>! Wanna know the tricks? Pay me and I'll teach you when you're free.

BiggerDesc: Whew... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> this time. It'll make up for your loss if it's wrong.
SmallerDesc: Whew... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> this time. It'll make up for your loss if it's wrong.

BiggerDesc: I hear the flute in the wind... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>, Conductor. It's what the wind told me.
SmallerDesc: I hear the flute in the wind... Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>, Conductor. It's what the wind told me.

BiggerDesc: (Sniffs) Go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. I remember the smell.
SmallerDesc: (Sniffs) Go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. I remember the smell.

BiggerDesc: Haha, you want me to reveal the truth hidden under the card? Then, how about we go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>?
SmallerDesc: Haha, you want me to reveal the truth hidden under the card? Then, how about we go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>?

BiggerDesc: Hmm... It's <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>! Although I'm not good at math, but my first instinct is never wrong!
SmallerDesc: Hmm... It's <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>! Although I'm not good at math, but my first instinct is never wrong!

BiggerDesc: At your request, the result is <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> with the success rate of 99.85%, Commandant.
SmallerDesc: At your request, the result is <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> with the success rate of 99.85%, Commandant.

BiggerDesc: Let me toss a coin... Right. It's gotta be <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. I'm always lucky with games like this.
SmallerDesc: Let me toss a coin... Right. It's gotta be <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. I'm always lucky with games like this.

BiggerDesc: Is that a new order? Bambinata thinks... you should go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>.
SmallerDesc: Is that a new order? Bambinata thinks... you should go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>.

BiggerDesc: I was good at these games onboard... How about we go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> this time?
SmallerDesc: I was good at these games onboard... How about we go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> this time?

BiggerDesc: What are the rules? I don't know. Just go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>! Don't worry. I'll blow this place up for you if you lose.
SmallerDesc: What are the rules? I don't know. Just go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>! Don't worry. I'll blow this place up for you if you lose.

BiggerDesc: ...Will it be against the rules to ask people for help? No...? Then go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>. It should be right.
SmallerDesc: ...Will it be against the rules to ask people for help? No...? Then go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>. It should be right.

BiggerDesc: Well... I can't decide for you, b-but if you want an answer from me... Then go with <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>!
SmallerDesc: Well... I can't decide for you, b-but if you want an answer from me... Then go with <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>!

BiggerDesc: Seriously? You needed me for this? It's a no-brainer: go <color=#34AFF8>Big</color>.
SmallerDesc: Seriously? You needed me for this? It's a no-brainer: go <color=#34AFF8>Small</color>.

BiggerDesc: Can't decide? Just close your eyes and pick one! Aha—it's the <color=#34AFF8>Big</color> one, Commander!
SmallerDesc: Can't decide? Just close your eyes and pick one! Aha—it's the <color=#34AFF8>Small</color> one, Commander!
